mapper.sql: homeid, communityid, regionid, homeprice, homeway, homearea, homestype, prictureid, homeurl, homehot
mapper.insert: insert into t_home (homeid, communityid, regionid, homeprice, homeway, homearea, homestype, prictureid, homeurl, homehot) values (#{homeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{communityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homeprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homeway,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homestype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prictureid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homeurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homehot,jdbcType=INTEGER})

homeid,

mapper.update:
update t_home
communityid = #{communityid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
homeprice = #{homeprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
homeway = #{homeway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
homearea = #{homearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
homestype = #{homestype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prictureid = #{prictureid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
homeurl = #{homeurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
homehot = #{homehot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where homeid = #{homeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_home set communityid = #{communityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, homeprice = #{homeprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, homeway = #{homeway,jdbcType=INTEGER}, homearea = #{homearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, homestype = #{homestype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prictureid = #{prictureid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, homeurl = #{homeurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, homehot = #{homehot,jdbcType=INTEGER} where homeid = #{homeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select h.homeid,cc.comname,g.regionname,h.homeprice,h.homearea,s.stylename,p.pictureurl,b.wayname,h.homeurl,h.homehot from t_home h inner join t_region g on h.regionid= g.regionid inner join t_style s on h.homestype = s.styleid inner join t_picture p on h.prictureid = p.pictureid inner join t_community cc on h.communityid = cc.communityid inner join t_way b on h.homeway = b.wayid

select h.homeid,cc.comname,g.regionname,h.homeprice,h.homearea,s.stylename,p.pictureurl,b.wayname,h.homeurl,h.homehot from t_home h inner join t_region g on h.regionid= g.regionid inner join t_style s on h.homestype = s.styleid inner join t_picture p on h.prictureid = p.pictureid inner join t_community cc on h.communityid = cc.communityid inner join t_way b on h.homeway = b.wayid where h.homehot=2

select h.homeid,cc.comname,g.regionname,h.homeprice,h.homearea,s.stylename,p.pictureurl,b.wayname,h.homeurl,h.homehot from t_home h inner join t_region g on h.regionid= g.regionid inner join t_style s on h.homestype = s.styleid inner join t_picture p on h.prictureid = p.pictureid inner join t_community cc on h.communityid = cc.communityid inner join t_way b on h.homeway = b.wayid where h.homehot=3

select h.homeid,cc.comname,g.regionname,h.homeprice,h.homearea,s.stylename,p.pictureurl,b.wayname,h.homeurl,h.homehot from t_home h inner join t_region g on h.regionid= g.regionid inner join t_style s on h.homestype = s.styleid inner join t_picture p on h.prictureid = p.pictureid inner join t_community cc on h.communityid = cc.communityid inner join t_way b on h.homeway = b.wayid where h.regionid= #{regionid}

select h.homeid,cc.comname,g.regionname,h.homeprice,h.homearea,s.stylename,p.pictureurl,b.wayname,h.homeurl,h.homehot from t_home h inner join t_region g on h.regionid= g.regionid inner join t_style s on h.homestype = s.styleid inner join t_picture p on h.prictureid = p.pictureid inner join t_community cc on h.communityid = cc.communityid inner join t_way b on h.homeway = b.wayid where h.homeway = #{homeway}

select h.homeid,cc.comname,g.regionname,h.homeprice,h.homearea,s.stylename,p.pictureurl,b.wayname,h.homeurl,h.homehot from t_home h inner join t_region g on h.regionid= g.regionid inner join t_style s on h.homestype = s.styleid inner join t_picture p on h.prictureid = p.pictureid inner join t_community cc on h.communityid = cc.communityid inner join t_way b on h.homeway = b.wayid where h.homestype = #{homestype}
